data.title: I-96 - American Jewish Historical Society, New England Archives
data.meta_description: I-96 - American Jewish Historical Society, New England Archives
data.text: Boston Hebrew Immigrant Aid Society Collection, undated, 1886-1977 (Bulk 1938-1954) *I-96 AJHS Boston HIAS #I-96 1 243 document boxes Re-Processing Date: September 2010 3 oversized boxes 124.5 linear feet Re-Processed by: Judith Garner, Stephanie Call, Myrto Barth, Richard Rosen, Benjamin Owen, Kelsey Sawyer, Mary Chen, Rebecca Simon, Lael Dalal, Sarah Amwater, Jessie Xu, Sarah Raykhtsaum, Leah Ellenbogen Languages: English, Hebrew, German, Polish, French, Yiddish, Russian ACQUISITION: Acquisition information is unknown. ACCESS: The collection is open to all researchers by permission of the Director of Library and Archives of the American Jewish Historical Society, except items that are restricted due to their fragility. RELATED MATERIALS: Papers of Abraham Alpert, P-544 Papers of Rabbi David Alpert, P-82 Records of the Immigrants Mutual Aid Society, I-109 Records of the Hebrew Immigrant Aid Society, New York (I-363, AJHS NY) Records of Beth Hamidrash Hagodol, I-239 Records of the Combined Jewish Philanthropies, I-220 HIAS, New York National Office, http://reunion.hias.org/en/pages/immigrantrecords CITATION: Description of item, date of item, Boston Hebrew Immigrant Aid Society, I-96, Box #/Folder #, Collection of the American Jewish Historical Society, Boston, MA, and New York, NY. LITERARY RIGHTS: Information concerning the literary rights may be obtained from the Director of Library and Archives of the American Jewish Historical Society. Users must apply in writing for permission to quote, reproduce or otherwise publish manuscript materials found in this collection.
